analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ sa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naanārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho anārammaṇo

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe…
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa adhipatiyā ekavīsa pe
